title: Fall Semester
desc: The Fall session is designed to provide students with robotics experience while they are enrolled as a full time student.

title: Spring Semester
desc: The spring session is designed to be balanced with a typical second semester workload in school.

title: Summer
desc: RoboReach's Summer program is designed to be an intensive 8-weeks in which students can truly immerse themselves in their projects. As such, students will create larger robots with more features over the summer program than the will during the academic year.
buildsOffered: Common Build, Challenge Build, Creative Build
